channel.title: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago
channel.description:
Well, i haven't done ANYTHING to my server at all. So don't ask what i did and it started happening... :| Well, when i run my server after about 2-5 seconds something in my run.bat screen pops up saying...
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "677 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Soruce) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2079) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:555) at server.main(server.java:112)[/code]
Then of course it says my server is online and running... Any ideas? It's very appreciated if you could help me:)

item.title: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Yes… but what happens if he changes it to what it was before he changed it?

Read full topic

item.source: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago

item.title: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:13, topic:305598”]ok all of u fools are wrong!!!
the problem is ur npcdrop.cfg ok? see how u have all ur 677 drops under each other?
don’t do this or u will get that error in run.bat what u need to do is this.

in ur drops.cfg i assume u alredy have other drops yes?

u need to do this:

npcdrop = 677 995 45000 1 //demon cash drop then under that put a different npcdrop example.)
npcdrop = 21 995 23000 1 //guard cash drop (and under this one put another bdemon drop e.g.)
npcdrop = 677 1050 1 1 //bdemon whatever the hell this drop is

you need to space them out like that and trust me it will work fine then.
rep++ for the time i spent writing this? :D[/quote]

that’s incorrect, the problem is that he used a space on the 5th line after ‘667’

Read full topic
item.source: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago

item.title: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ok all of u fools are wrong!!!
the problem is ur npcdrop.cfg ok? see how u have all ur 677 drops under each other?
don’t do this or u will get that error in run.bat what u need to do is this.

in ur drops.cfg i assume u alredy have other drops yes?

u need to do this:

npcdrop = 677 995 45000 1 //demon cash drop then under that put a different npcdrop example.)
npcdrop = 21 995 23000 1 //guard cash drop (and under this one put another bdemon drop e.g.)
npcdrop = 677 1050 1 1 //bdemon whatever the hell this drop is

you need to space them out like that and trust me it will work fine then.
rep++ for the time i spent writing this?

Read full topic

Yeah, you can get errors if you use tab instead of space. Did you add anything that you can remember?
[/quote]

item.title: Error running my server... Was working about 2 days ago
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote="`Sublime, post:4, topic:305598"][quote author=PushedPrawn link=topic=401835.msg2978128#msg2978128 date=1254427455]
Well, i haven’t done ANYTHING to my server at all. So don’t ask what i did and it started happening… Well, when i run my server after about 2-5 seconds something in my run.bat screen pops up saying…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "677 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Soruce) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2079) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:555) at server.main(server.java:112)

Then of course it says my server is online and running… Any ideas? It’s very appreciated if you could help me:)
[/quote]
I think you have something in your NPCdrops.cfg file, try searching for 677 Im not entirely sure though[/quote]

//Black Demon
npcdrop = 677	995	450000	75
npcdrop = 677	3140	1	35
npcdrop = 677	1050	1	1
npcdrop = 677	1053	1	1
npcdrop = 677 	1055	1	1
npcdrop = 677	1057	1	1
npcdrop = 677	2633	1	12
npcdrop = 677	2653	1	9
npcdrop = 677	2655	1	10
npcdrop = 677	2657	1	10
npcdrop = 677	2659	1	10

That’s all my 677’s
